title: YhapoJJ Drops New Project Before T.L.Y.: Listen
description: The Alabama rapper has a new, nine-track release that fits between P.S. Fuck You and the forthcoming Thanks Li Yhap
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The Alabama rapper has a new, nine-track release that fits between P.S. Fuck You and the forthcoming Thanks Li Yhap
text: Huntsville, Alabama, rapper YhapoJJ is back with a new project to follow May’s P.S. Fuck You. The new, nine-song Before T.L.Y. has guest spots from Nino Paid, NDO Dee, RRoxket, and Benji Blue Bills, as well as production from Goyxrd, Al Chapo, and others. Find the project, along with YhapoJJ’s new video for “Jeepers Creepers,” below.YhapoJJ began turning heads, last year, with Evolution of Xur, a six-song EP that includes one of his more popular songs, “1O.” The title of his new project indicates that he’s planning to release another new project, Thanks Li Yhap, soon.
html:
Huntsville, Alabama, rapper YhapoJJ is back with a new project to follow May’s P.S. Fuck You. The new, nine-song Before T.L.Y. has guest spots from Nino Paid, NDO Dee, RRoxket, and Benji Blue Bills, as well as production from Goyxrd, Al Chapo, and others. Find the project, along with YhapoJJ’s new video for “Jeepers Creepers,” below.

YhapoJJ began turning heads, last year, with Evolution of Xur, a six-song EP that includes one of his more popular songs, “1O.” The title of his new project indicates that he’s planning to release another new project, Thanks Li Yhap, soon.
